channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Edit Comments

item.title: CVE-2021-24551|2024-08-03T19:35:19.902Z -- unknown -- edit%20comments
item.description: The Edit Comments WordPress plugin through 0.3 does not sanitise, validate or escape the jal_edit_comments GET parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection issue
